BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The timestamp for when the block was collated.

EVENT_INDEX.name: EVENT_INDEX
EVENT_INDEX.comment: Integer of of the log position in the block.

NATIVE_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.name: NATIVE_CONTRACT_ADDRESS
NATIVE_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.comment: Native Harmony address of the contract.

EVENT_INPUTS.name: EVENT_INPUTS
EVENT_INPUTS.comment: Parameter inputs for the event called.

TOPICS.name: TOPICS
TOPICS.comment: Array of 0 to 4 32 Bytes data of indexed log arguments.

DATA.name: DATA
DATA.comment: Contains the non-indexed arguments of the log.

EVENT_REMOVED.name: EVENT_REMOVED
EVENT_REMOVED.comment: True when the log was removed, due to a chain reorganization. false if its a valid log.

row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

FACT_EVENT_LOGS_ID.comment: The surrogate key for the table. Will be unique and is used as a foreign key in other tables

EVENT_INDEX.name: EVENT_INDEX
EVENT_INDEX.comment: Integer of of the log position in the block.

NATIVE_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.name: NATIVE_CONTRACT_ADDRESS
NATIVE_CONTRACT_ADDRESS.comment: Native Harmony address of the contract.

FACT_SWAPS_ID.name: FACT_SWAPS_ID
FACT_SWAPS_ID.comment: The surrogate key for the table. Will be unique and is used as a foreign key in other tables

POOL_ADDRESS.name: POOL_ADDRESS
POOL_ADDRESS.comment: The pool address that the swap was conducted in.

AMOUNT0IN.name: AMOUNT0IN
AMOUNT0IN.comment: The amount of `token0` that went into the swap.

AMOUNT1IN.name: AMOUNT1IN
AMOUNT1IN.comment: The amount of `token1` that went into the swap.

AMOUNT0OUT.name: AMOUNT0OUT
AMOUNT0OUT.comment: The amount of `token0` that came out from the swap.

AMOUNT1OUT.name: AMOUNT1OUT
AMOUNT1OUT.comment: The amount of `token` that came out from the swap.

FROM_ADDRESS.name: FROM_ADDRESS
FROM_ADDRESS.comment: The address that triggered the swap.

TO_ADDRESS.name: TO_ADDRESS
TO_ADDRESS.comment: The address that the out tokens go to.

metadata.name: TOKENPRICES
metadata.comment: Volume-weighted average daily prices based on swap data, assuming curated stables = 1 USD, and preferring the most liquid pair.  Token prices will show up if they have at least USD100 of daily volume.

KEY.name: KEY
KEY.comment: The unique key for the block_date and token_address.

BLOCK_DATE.name: BLOCK_DATE
BLOCK_DATE.comment: The date of the token price.

USD_PRICE.name: USD_PRICE
USD_PRICE.comment: Volume-weighted average price calculated on the `block_date`.

USD_VOLUME.name: USD_VOLUME
USD_VOLUME.comment: The USD-equivalent amount swapped on the `block_date` based on curated liquidity pool list.

TOKEN_VOLUME.name: TOKEN_VOLUME
TOKEN_VOLUME.comment: The amount of tokens swapped on this date based on the curated liquidity pool list.

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

clustering_key.label: Clustering Key
clustering_key.description: The key used to cluster this table

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: TRANSACTIONS
metadata.comment: Transactions from the Harmony chain shard 0. Duplicates have been removed.

RECORD_ID.name: RECORD_ID
RECORD_ID.comment: A unique id for the record generated by Chainwalkers.

TX_ID.name: TX_ID
TX_ID.comment: Synonmous with transaction hash, a unique on chain identifier for the transaction.

TX_BLOCK_INDEX.name: TX_BLOCK_INDEX
TX_BLOCK_INDEX.comment: The index of the transaction within the block. Starts at 0.

BLOCK_ID.name: BLOCK_ID
BLOCK_ID.comment: The height of the chain this block corresponds with.

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The time the block was minted.

NETWORK.name: NETWORK
NETWORK.comment: The blockchain network. (i.e. mainnet, testnet, etc.)

CHAIN_ID.name: CHAIN_ID
CHAIN_ID.comment: Synonmous with blockchain name for Harmony.

_INSERTED_TIMESTAMP.name: _INSERTED_TIMESTAMP
_INSERTED_TIMESTAMP.comment: The time this row was ingested by Chainwalkers.

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: DIM_BLOCKS
metadata.comment: This table records all the blocks of Harmony blockchain.

DIM_BLOCK_ID.name: DIM_BLOCK_ID
DIM_BLOCK_ID.comment: The surrogate key for the table. Will be unique and is used as a foreign key in other tables

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The timestamp for when the block was collated.

BLOCK_PARENT_HASH.name: BLOCK_PARENT_HASH
BLOCK_PARENT_HASH.comment: Hash of the parent block (32 Bytes).

GAS_LIMIT.name: GAS_LIMIT
GAS_LIMIT.comment: The maximum gas allowed in this block.

GAS_USED.name: GAS_USED
GAS_USED.comment: The total used gas by all transactions in this block.

MINER.name: MINER
MINER.comment: The address of the beneficiary to whom the mining rewards were given.

NONCE.name: NONCE
NONCE.comment: Hash of the generated proof-of-work (8 Bytes).

SIZE.name: SIZE
SIZE.comment: Integer the size of this block in bytes.

TX_COUNT.name: TX_COUNT
TX_COUNT.comment: The number of transactions in the given block.

STATE_ROOT.name: STATE_ROOT
STATE_ROOT.comment: The root hash that stores the entire state of the system - account balances, contract storage, contract code and account nonces are inside

RECEIPTS_ROOT.name: RECEIPTS_ROOT
RECEIPTS_ROOT.comment: The root hash that stores receipts of all transactions included in the block.

_INSERTED_TIMESTAMP.name: _INSERTED_TIMESTAMP
_INSERTED_TIMESTAMP.comment: The timestamp for when the block was ingested.

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

DIM_TOKENS_ID.name: DIM_TOKENS_ID
DIM_TOKENS_ID.comment: The surrogate key for the table. Will be unique and is used as a foreign key in other tables

TOKEN_NAME.name: TOKEN_NAME
TOKEN_NAME.comment: The token's name as read from the blockchain.

TOKEN_SYMBOL.name: TOKEN_SYMBOL
TOKEN_SYMBOL.comment: The token's symbol (e.g WONE) as read from the blockchain.

DECIMALS.name: DECIMALS
DECIMALS.comment: The token's decimals as read from the blockchain.

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

FACT_TRANSFERS_ID.name: FACT_TRANSFERS_ID
FACT_TRANSFERS_ID.comment: The surrogate key for the table. Will be unique and is used as a foreign key in other tables

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The time the block was minted.

CONTRACT_ADDRESS.name: CONTRACT_ADDRESS
CONTRACT_ADDRESS.comment: The address of the transferred token.

metadata.name: FACT_TRANSACTIONS
metadata.comment: This table records all the transactions of the Harmony blockchain.

FACT_TRANSACTIONS_ID.name: FACT_TRANSACTIONS_ID
FACT_TRANSACTIONS_ID.comment: The surrogate key for the table. Will be unique and is used as a foreign key in other tables

BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.name: BLOCK_TIMESTAMP
BLOCK_TIMESTAMP.comment: The time when the block was mined.

NONCE.name: NONCE
NONCE.comment: The number of transactions made by the sender prior to this one.

INDEX.name: INDEX
INDEX.comment: Integer of the transactions index position in the block. `null` when its pending.

NATIVE_FROM_ADDRESS.name: NATIVE_FROM_ADDRESS
NATIVE_FROM_ADDRESS.comment: Native Harmony address of the sender.

NATIVE_TO_ADDRESS.name: NATIVE_TO_ADDRESS
NATIVE_TO_ADDRESS.comment: Native Harmony address of the receiver.

FROM_ADDRESS.name: FROM_ADDRESS
FROM_ADDRESS.comment: The Ethereum address of the sender.

TO_ADDRESS.name: TO_ADDRESS
TO_ADDRESS.comment: The Ethereum address of the receiver.

VALUE.name: VALUE
VALUE.comment: The value transfered in ATTO format (a factor of 10^18).

BLOCK_NUMBER.name: BLOCK_NUMBER
BLOCK_NUMBER.comment: Block number where this transaction was in. `null` when it's pending.

BLOCK_HASH.name: BLOCK_HASH
BLOCK_HASH.comment: Hash of the block where this transaction was in. `null` when it's pending.

GAS_PRICE.name: GAS_PRICE
GAS_PRICE.comment: Gas price provided by the sender.

TX_HASH.name: TX_HASH
TX_HASH.comment: The Ethereum hash of the transaction which is the primary key for this table.

DATA.name: DATA
DATA.comment: Bytecode of the data sent along with the transaction.

STATUS.name: STATUS
STATUS.comment: Boolean representing whether the transaction is successful or not.

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

row_count.label: Row Count
row_count.description: An approximate count of rows in this table

bytes.label: Approximate Size
bytes.description: Approximate size of the table as reported by Snowflake

has_stats.label: Has Stats?
has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

BLOCK_PARENT_HASH.name: BLOCK_PARENT_HASH

GAS_USED.name: GAS_USED

NONCE.comment: Hash of the generated proof-of-work (8 Bytes).

STATE_ROOT.name: STATE_ROOT
STATE_ROOT.comment: The root hash that stores the entire state of the system - account balances, contract storage, contract code and account nonces are inside

RECEIPTS_ROOT.comment: The root hash that stores receipts of all transactions included in the block.

metadata.name: FACT_TOKENPRICES
metadata.comment: Volume-weighted average daily prices based on swap data, assuming curated stables = 1 USD, and preferring the most liquid pair.  Token prices will show up if they have at least USD100 of daily volume.

FACT_TOKENPRICES_ID.name: FACT_TOKENPRICES_ID
FACT_TOKENPRICES_ID.comment: The surrogate key for the table. Will be unique and is used as a foreign key in other tables

BLOCK_DATE.name: BLOCK_DATE
BLOCK_DATE.comment: The date of the token price.

USD_PRICE.name: USD_PRICE
USD_PRICE.comment: Volume-weighted average price calculated on the `block_date`.

USD_VOLUME.name: USD_VOLUME
USD_VOLUME.comment: The USD-equivalent amount swapped on the `block_date` based on curated liquidity pool list.

TOKEN_VOLUME.name: TOKEN_VOLUME
TOKEN_VOLUME.comment: The amount of tokens swapped on this date based on the curated liquidity pool list.

has_stats.description: Indicates whether there are statistics for this table

metadata.name: TOKENPRICE_FROM_SWAPS
metadata.comment: Volume-weighted average daily prices based on swap data, assuming curated stables = 1 USD, and preferring most liquid pair

USD_PRICE.name: USD_PRICE
USD_PRICE.comment: Volume-weighted average price during the block_date

USD_VOLUME.name: USD_VOLUME
USD_VOLUME.comment: The USD-equivalent amount swapped on this date based on curated liquidity pool list

TOKEN_VOLUME.name: TOKEN_VOLUME
TOKEN_VOLUME.comment: The amount of tokens swapped on this date based on curated liquidity pool list

PAIR_TOKEN_FOR_PRICE.name: PAIR_TOKEN_FOR_PRICE
PAIR_TOKEN_FOR_PRICE.comment: The swap pair token used to lookup the usd price, usually the highest volume pair

PAIR_SYMBOL_FOR_PRICE.name: PAIR_SYMBOL_FOR_PRICE
PAIR_SYMBOL_FOR_PRICE.comment: The symbol for the swap pair token used to lookup the usd price, usually the highest volume pair

VOLUME_FOR_PRICE.name: VOLUME_FOR_PRICE
VOLUME_FOR_PRICE.comment: The quantity of the token swapped with the pair that was used to lookup the usd_price.

LOOKUP_ROUND.name: LOOKUP_ROUND
LOOKUP_ROUND.comment: Admin field - the point in the price lookup loop that this price was matched

POOL_NAME.name: POOL_NAME
POOL_NAME.comment: The internally generated name generated by `token0`'s symbol and `token1`'s symbol (e.g JEWEL-WONE LP).
